description: Noun use of the verb crack down.

nouns.description: Noun use of the verb crack down.

entries.meaning: Abruptly stern measures or disciplinary action; increased enforcement
examples: After a harsh police crackdown last week fueled anger and swelled protests, President Dilma Rousseff, a former guerrilla who was imprisoned under the dictatorship and has now become the target of pointed criticism herself, tried to appease dissenters by embracing their cause on Tuesday.
